backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (UserProfile, Ad, AdWatch, WithdrawalRequest), state maps/lists, and backend functions for user profiles, ad management, ad watching/claiming, dashboard stats, and withdrawal requests with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (user registration, ad watching flow, dashboard, withdrawal system) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries for each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app with a root div mount point and a module script tag loading main.tsx; page title is 'PTC Website'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry point that configures TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboard, ads list, watch-ad, and withdrawal pages, and renders ProfileSetupModal and Toaster at the root level.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button supporting three visual variants (default, hero, nav) with loading state handling and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal dialog that collects username and email from new users and saves their profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation. It blocks dismissal until the profile is successfully submitted.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a sticky Header, a main content outlet, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky navigation header showing the AdEarn logo, nav links (Dashboard, Watch Ads, Withdraw), user balance, and a login button; includes a responsive mobile menu toggled by a hamburger icon.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalHistor: Table component that fetches and displays the caller's withdrawal history sorted by date, with colored status badges (pending/approved/rejected) and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and persisted identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the backend actor, covering user profile, ads, ad watches, dashboard stats, and withdrawal operations with appropriate cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a navy/gold dark theme via CSS custom properties (oklch), Tailwind base/utilities, and custom utility classes for gold gradients, glows, navy cards, and status badges.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrapping the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/AdsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of available ads with daily watch tracking, showing stats (total, available today, watched today) and linking to individual ad watch pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing earnings stats (balance, ads watched today, total watched), recent ad watch history, and a withdrawal history table.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public marketing landing page for AdEarn, featuring a hero section, how-it-works steps, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/WatchAdPage.tsx: Ad viewing page with a countdown timer that must complete before the user can claim a $100 reward, then navigates back to the ads list.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalPage.tsx: Withdrawal request form that validates a minimum $500 amount against the user's balance, submits the request, and displays withdrawal history.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom theme with gold/navy color palette, Inter/Bebas Neue fonts, custom shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a PTC (Paid-To-Click) platform where users earn $100 per ad watched, tracking existing features, architectural notes, image requirements, and build history.
